item.description:
OK, its now February of 2007, what are you doing to change yourself and the world?

At this month's NLP meeting, we'll be focused on using NLP to change the world for the better. NLP has some great stuff for personal and group change, and we'll be doing both this month.

Bring your courage, your vision, your passion, and your curiousity when you show up on February 22. As always, both newcomers and experts (and anyone in between) are welcome.

Adam.


PS A reminder that the venue has changed. In response to feedback, we are changing to a quieter, non-restaurant forum. Andover-Newton Theological School is conveniently located in Newton Center, with free parking.
You can get directions here:
http://ants.edu/about...
Here is a map of the campus:
http://ants.edu/about...
Please note that this location is NOT handicapped accessible, as it entails climbing two flights of stairs.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Changing the World for the Better with NLP
